dcterms:creator: Manuel Martin
Alina Roitberg
Monica Haurilet
Matthias Horne
Simon Reiß
Michael Voit
Rainer Stiefelhagen
dcterms:description: A large-scale video dataset (over 9.6 million frames) consisting of various driver activities. Annotations are provided for 12 classes of top-level activities, 34 categories of fine-grained activities, and 372 classes of atomic action units involving triplet of action, object, and location.
dcterms:title: Drive&Act

dcterms:creator: Yehya Abouelnaga
Hesham M Eraqi
Mohamed N Moustafa
dcterms:description: Contains 12977 train and 4331 test images from 31 drivers across 7 different countries. It includes 10 activity classes such as safe driving and texting.
dcterms:title: Distracted Driver V1

dcterms:creator: Hesham M Eraqi
Yehya Abouelnaga
Mohamed H Saad
Mohamed N Moustafa
dcterms:description: A newer iteration of Distracted Driver V1, containing 14478 images from 44 drivers using the same 10 activities. It includes a split for training and testing images.
dcterms:title: Distracted Driver V2

dcterms:creator: Kiwon Yun
Jean Honorio
Debaleena Chattopadhyay
Tamara L Berg
Dimitris Samaras
dcterms:description: Consists of 282 videos with 8 different activity classes, focusing on interactions between two subjects, relevant to driver’s secondary activities.
dcterms:title: SBU Kinect Interaction
